title: Kyler Murray's "study clause"; Cowboys place in NFC East; Tyreek and Tua; DE Yannick Ngakoue
itunes:title: Kyler Murray's "study clause"; Cowboys place in NFC East; Tyreek and Tua; DE Yannick Ngakoue
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast begins reacting to the “study clause” in Kyler Murray’s contract. Hosts Jamie Erdahl, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Super Bowl Champion Jason McCourty explain why the clause in Murray’s contract is crazy and then they play “we in or we out” where they discuss if the Dallas Cowboys should be the favorites in the NFC East. Later, the GMFB panel responds to Tyreek Hill’s comments about Tua Tagovailoa, where he called Tua the “most accurate quarterback in the NFL”. The show finishes up being joined by Indianapolis Colts DE Yannick Ngakoue and he talks about preparing for his first season with Indy, his mentorship by Howie Long, and his relationship with Colts fans.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
